annotations.title: Three Hundred Years of Day Drinking | How to Drink

textContent:
2 Oranges
1/2 Lemon
Orange Slices
750 ml Red wine (tempranillo)
Orange Slices
Apple Slices (optional)
Fruits
2 oz. -or- 60ml. cinnamon syrup
4 oz. -or- 120ml. simple syrup

Add everything in a pitcher
Pour into glass with ice and drink

title: Sangria
